description: Former national security adviser John Bolton said Tuesday he will not be intimidated by the withdrawal of his security detail, which was revoked by President Trump in January.  The measure followed an Iranian plot on his life uncovered by federal officials.  "I feel ... concerned about that, more than anything else,” Bolton said of losing...
